30#include <sys/cdefs.h>
31#ifndef lint
32__COPYRIGHT("@(#) Copyright (c) 1988, 1993, 1994\
33 The Regents of the University of California. All rights reserved.");
34#endif /* not lint */
35
36#ifndef lint
37/*static char sccsid[] = "@(#)env.c 8.3 (Berkeley) 4/2/94";*/
38__RCSID("$NetBSD: env.c,v 1.20 2010/11/16 02:53:49 christos Exp $");
39#endif /* not lint */
40
41#include <err.h>
42#include <stdio.h>
43#include <string.h>
44#include <stdlib.h>
45#include <unistd.h>
46#include <locale.h>
47#include <errno.h>
48
49static void usage(void) __attribute__((__noreturn__));
50
51extern char **environ;
52
53int
54main(int argc, char **argv)
55{
56 char **ep;
57 char *cleanenv[1];
58 int ch;
59
60 setprogname(*argv);
61 (void)setlocale(LC_ALL, "");
62
63 while ((ch = getopt(argc, argv, "-i")) != -1)
64 switch((char)ch) {
65 case '-': /* obsolete */
66 case 'i':
67 environ = cleanenv;
68 cleanenv[0] = NULL;
69 break;
70 case '?':
71 default:
72 usage();
73 }
74
75 for (argv += optind; *argv && strchr(*argv, '=') != NULL; ++argv)
76 (void)putenv(*argv);
77
78 if (*argv) {
79 /* return 127 if the command to be run could not be found; 126
80 if the command was found but could not be invoked */
81
82 (void)execvp(*argv, argv);
83 err((errno == ENOENT) ? 127 : 126, "%s", *argv);
84 /* NOTREACHED */
85 }
86
87 for (ep = environ; *ep; ep++)
88 (void)printf("%s\n", *ep);
89
90 exit(0);
91}
92
93static void
94usage(void)
95{
96 (void)fprintf(stderr, "Usage: %s [-i] [name=value ...] [command]\n",
97 getprogname());
98 exit(1);
99}
100
